name: Friday Night Funkin: Sarvente's Mid-Fight Masses port
name_original: Friday Night Funkin: Sarvente's Mid-Fight Masses port
description:
Mod: https://gamebanana.com/gamefiles/17646

Friday Night Funkin': https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Notes: Gospel replaces bopeebo, worship replaces south and parish replaces pico, and the rest of the levels have been removed for performance. 

IT IS STILL MISSING ZAVODILA

Version with normal Notes: https://sniper-gamingwastaken.itch.io/friday-night-funkin-sarventes-mid-fight-ma...

Kade engine version: https://sniper-gamingwastaken.itch.io/friday-night-funkin-sarventes-mid-fight-ma...

ALT MODE REPLACES HARD MODE

you can play the rest of the levels here: https://peppymods.itch.io/sarvente go thank Peppymods for this epic port.

changelog:

added worship and parish

compressed other songs for faster load times since if you remove a file in this game it crashes.

fixed Sarvente's note up and right animations bugging out.

known issues: 

Sarvente's animations on parish are a little broke

souths background can still be seen a little bit lol.

 Sarvente's animations on worship sometimes stop working lmao.

 Sarvente's voice cuts off a little bit near the middle-ish beginning.

bopeebo's animation while playing the song lol.
